tool_description: This api will check whether the supplied mail is disposable mail or not.
name: Tempmailchecker
title: Tempmailchecker

api_list.name: notemp
api_list.description: Welcome to the Temporary Mail Checking API, your one-stop solution for verifying and managing temporary and disposable email addresses. This API is designed to empower businesses and developers with the tools they need to enhance security, reduce fraudulent activities, and streamline user communication.
